text: Class attribute for two instances of the same class

code:
class Sample:
    variable = 2
object1 = Sample()
object2 = Sample()
print object1.variable  # 2
print object2.variable  # 2
object1.variable = 1
print object1.variable  # 1
print object2.variable  # 2 <- why not 1 too?

text: Why object2.variable is not also 1 after assignment to class variable?
